duration_in_months: All fields stored in a multifaceted format, perfect for subsequent analysis. described below.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**

**Tender Title**
---------------
Formative Evaluation of the 2020-2028 Volunteer Cooperation Program (VCP)

**Notice ID**
---------------
cb-9391-96746639

**Contract Notice**
-------------------
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the formative evaluation of the 2020-2028 Volunteer Cooperation Program (VCP). The evaluation will cover all 13 development projects funded through the VCP, implemented in 47 countries across Africa, Asia, and Latin America and the Caribbean.

**Key Dates**
-------------

* Publication Date: 24 January 2024
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 17 February 2024, at 14:00 EST
* Amendment Date: 1 February 2024

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

* Tender Status: Cancelled
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)
* Scheme of Tendering: Competitive, Selective Tendering
* Notification Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

This procurement is governed by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and several other trade agreements that Canada has negotiated with countries and regions.

**Regions of Opportunity**
---------------------------

The successful bidder will be expected to work in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Information**
---------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
* Address: 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0G4, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Point of Contact: Viacheslav Zub
* Email: [viacheslav.zub@international.gc.ca](mailto:viacheslav.zub)
* Phone: 343-553-4631

**Notice and Tenders Availability**
--------------------------------

The official notice and tenders are available on the CANADEBUY buyandsell.gc.ca website at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca and at the Government of Canada's Global Trade Law website. (Not applicable in this case as the tender has already been closed).

**Proposal and Information Sheets**
-----------------------------------

Two tender documents are available for download from the notice above: the formative evaluation services for the VCP English language document (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/11484/24-243809---npp---v
